TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LoadBalancingSupportedAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class LoadBalancingSupportedAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class LoadBalancingSupportedAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Determina si el componente participa en el equilibrio de carga, en caso de que el servicio de equilibrio de carga de componentes esté instalado y habilitado en el servidor.

span.span: Determines whether the component participates in load balancing, if the component load balancing service is installed and enabled on the server.
